title: Poached sea trout with crushed purple potatoes, mango salsa, asparagus and basil vinaigrette
description: Sea trout cooked sous vide and served with a summery salsa and vinaigrette. If you don’t have sous vide equipment the fish can be baked in foil instead.For this recipe you will need a blender, a water bath, a vac pac machine and a chef’s blow torch.
ingredients: 1 large ripe mango, peeled, stone removed, cut into small cubes
1 ripe avocado, stone removed, peeled, finely chopped
½ red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
⅓ cucumber, cut into small cubes
50ml/2fl oz olive oil or rapeseed oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
15g/½oz basil leaves, torn into small pieces
